overview:
Rob is the Co-Founder of MediSherpa.

Rob was born in Montreal, Quebec and grew up in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. Attended University in the Eastern Townships where he received a B.B.A in Management Science & Information Systems (MIS) with a minor in Economics. Shortly after graduation started working in Ottawa. Not long after that became the youngest in Canada to receive the professional designation attached to the field.

Through the years acquired most of the trappings of success and was left feeling if something didn’t change, he’d be 60 and sitting in his boss’s office wondering what might have been of his dreams.

Rob is responsible for the regional marketing activities at MediSherpa.
